abstract.t: This draft documents the use of MCoA (Multiple Care-of Address) method defined in [4] in order to facilitate a Make Before Break within the Mobile IPv6 protocol [1] . This draft is intended to document the usage of MCoA for achieving Make Before Break behavior. The current base Mobile IPv6 specification [1] doesn't include MCoA. With that draft currently under consideration it is possible to use these extensions for MBB.
